#summary Instructions on how to compile and JNAerator from sources

Checkout the latest sources (you'll need SVN installed) : 
{{{ 
svn co http://jnaerator.googlecode.com/svn/trunk jnaerator
cd jnaerator
}}}

Run the compilation script :
 * On Windows :
  {{{ script/compile }}}
 * On Mac OS X, Linux and other Unices :
  {{{ sh scripts/compile }}}

That should be it, you'll be able to run JNAerator with the following command :
 * On Windows :
  {{{ java -cp libraries\anarres-cpp.jar;libraries\antlr-runtime-3.1.jar;libraries\jna.jar;libraries\junit-4.4.jar;classes com.ochafik.lang.jnaerator.JNAerator }}}
 * On Mac OS X, Linux and other Unices :
  {{{ java -cp libraries/anarres-cpp.jar:libraries/antlr-runtime-3.1.jar:libraries/jna.jar:libraries/junit-4.4.jar:classes com.ochafik.lang.jnaerator.JNAerator }}}
